name: Imagineer
description: Your fabric illustrates playfulness and naivety; yet it also captures your ability to distinguish yourself from the rest by wearing what you feel is the best. It reflects the forever young heart that is held inside your chest, infusing your inability to shy away from your imagination and your true self into your looks. For you, glamour is not something that you expect to bring using external circumstances, but rather something you create and curate from within yourself, using your own medium to channel regardless of how the world perceives it to be. Conventions dissolve around you as you reflect your cheerful playfulness to everyone who witnesses you.
